name: Microzine 14
overview: Microzine Issue 14 features the following programs: The Funhouse Caper: A Twistaplot. Missing: A fabulous jeweled key. Suspects: Seven party guests, all dressed in costume. Detectives: You and your trusty robot, Wesley. Good Luck! Cartoon Maker: A graphics feature: Create your own cartoon strips using graphics, text, and word balloons. Print out your cartoons to share your sense of humor with your friends. Inventors & Inventions: A database. Browse through this database of 150 real and imaginary inventors and invetions. You'll find that some of the real inventions are wackier than the imaginary ones! Puzzler: A computer tool. Create your own crossword puzzles to challenge your friends' word skill. Or create a cross0number puzzle and see if they can "figure" it out!
